NWHLRink#

Note
This class is created for historical reference and the NWHL is now defunct. As of 2021, the NWHL has changed its name to the Premier Hockey Federation. Please use the PHFRink class going forward

Note:

This class is created for historical reference and the NWHL is now defunct. As of 2021, the NWHL has changed its name to the Premier Hockey Federation. Please use the PHFRink class going forward

class sportypy.surfaces.hockey.NWHLRink(rink_updates={}, *args, **kwargs)#

A subclass of HockeyRink specific to the NWHL.

See HockeyRink class documentation for full description.
